data.fullContent: While hybrid and electric cars have different power sources, they are both considered environmentally friendly vehicles. When it comes to economy and ecology, electric cars are superior to hybrids. The electric car requires almost no maintenance while the hybrid may need a transmission fluid change every 20,000 miles. However, the batteries in these cars need to be frequently charged, which can drive up your electric bill. It can also be difficult to charge them on long trips. Hybrid cars, on the other hand, give the driver more acceleration power, with some models capable of going from zero to sixty miles per hour in under ten seconds. And while the initial price of an electric vehicle can run in the $40,000 range, a hybrid may cost as little as $25,000. Hybrid vehicles are also more reliable and last longer than their electric counterparts.

q1.translation: 虽然混合动力汽车和电动汽车的动力来源不同，但它们都被认为是环保汽车。在经济和生态方面，电动汽车优于混合动力汽车。电动汽车几乎不需要维护，而混合动力汽车可能需要每20,000英里更换一次传动液。然而，这些汽车的电池需要经常充电，这可能会增加你的电费。
q1.front: While hybrid and electric cars have different power sources, they are both considered environmentally friendly vehicles. When it comes to economy and ecology, electric cars are superior to hybrids. The electric car requires almost no maintenance while the hybrid may need a transmission fluid change every 20,000 miles. However, the batteries in these cars need to be frequently charged, which can drive up your electric bill.
q1.content: While hybrid and electric cars ____ different power sources, they are both considered ____ friendly vehicles. When it comes to economy and ecology, electric cars are superior ____ hybrids. The electric car requires almost no maintenance while the hybrid may need a transmission fluid change every 20,000 miles. However, the batteries in these ____ need to be frequently charged, which can drive ____ your electric bill.

q2.translation: 虽然混合动力汽车和电动汽车的动力来源不同，但它们都被认为是环保汽车。在经济和生态方面，电动汽车优于混合动力汽车。电动汽车几乎不需要维护，而混合动力汽车可能需要每20,000英里更换一次传动液。然而，这些汽车的电池需要经常充电，这可能会增加你的电费。长途旅行时也很难充电。另一方面，混合动力汽车给驾驶员更大的加速力，有些车型可以在10秒内从零加速到每小时60英里。虽然电动车的初始价格在4万美元左右，但混合动力车的价格可能低至2.5万美元。混合动力汽车也比电动汽车更可靠，使用寿命更长。
q2.front: While hybrid and electric cars have different power sources, they are both considered environmentally friendly vehicles. When it comes to economy and ecology, electric cars are superior to hybrids. The electric car requires almost no maintenance while the hybrid may need a transmission fluid change every 20,000 miles. However, the batteries in these cars need to be frequently charged, which can drive up your electric bill.
q2.middle: It can also be difficult to charge them on long trips.
q2.ending: Hybrid cars, on the other hand, give the driver more acceleration power, with some models capable of going from zero to sixty miles per hour in under ten seconds. And while the initial price of an electric vehicle can run in the $40,000 range, a hybrid may cost as little as $25,000. Hybrid vehicles are also more reliable and last longer than their electric counterparts.

options.sentence: In addition to their significantly lower cost, hybrid vehicles last longer than electric cars do.
Electric vehicles have been around for a while, and they have been used in commercial settings such as taxi cabs.
Hybrids are more economical than their electric counterparts and can be charged using a standard household outlet in a matter of minutes.
An electric motor does not run on gasoline, though it does need to get current from a battery to run.
